meta.name: Hong Kong Committee in Norway
meta.about: Hong Kong Committee ( Hongkongkomiteen i Norge, organization number: 923 302 611 ) is a registered non-profit voluntary organization in Norway. We are politically neutral and aim at solidarity work for the fight of basic human rights in Hong Kong.

meta.name: Stand with Hong Kong - Norway
meta.about:
We connect in Norway. We stand with Hong Kong.
Follow us on Twitter: @hkc_no

meta.name: Hongkong Norge
meta.about:
Hong Kong Committee ( Hongkongkomiteen i Norge, organization number: 923 302 611 ) is a registered non-profit voluntary organization in Norway. We are politically neutral and aim at solidarity work for the fight of basic human rights in Hong Kong.

Please subscribe our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/standwithhk.norway/
